diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation, hypertension, coronary artery disease, hypothyroidism
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with abdominal pain radiating to the back, multiple stones in a dilated CBD and gall bladder on CT scan, elevated liver and pancreatic enzymes, and leukocytosis. An ERCP was performed, which confirmed the presence of gallstones causing pancreatitis.
